Html:
Section protection support would be usefull.
Other great feature is visual editing of new *.config file. It's look similar to http://www.codeplex.com/CoMan :)
P.S. and use multiple output for template file.
http://www.olegsych.com/2008/03/how-to-generate-multiple-outputs-from-single-t4-template/

With the release of version 1.2, we don't even use template files, and the file generation procedure has been improved a lot.

I created a work item for the section protection support.
